abstract.t: This document defines a NETCONF data model (in XML Schema) to be used to monitor the NETCONF protocol. The monitoring data model includes information about NETCONF datastores, sessions, locks, subscriptions, and statistics. This data facilitates the management of a NETCONF server. This document also defines methods for NETCONF clients to discover data models supported by a NETCONF server and defines a new NETCONF <get-schema> operation to retrieve them.
